entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • msquic.dll is no longer included in the Windows shared runtime #81447
  • HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args are not respected if DisableDefaults=true #81445
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] Eliminate `mov` instruction for functions that return small types - requires calling convention change #81443
  • [JIT] Sub-optimal chained bool optimization #81442
  • [mono][aot] Type System.ReadOnlySpan`1[T] is not a ByRefLike type so ref field, '_reference' is invalid #81438
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] CI test failure in OSX System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DualModeAccept.AcceptV4BoundToAnyV6_Success [FAIL] #81437
  • `AssemblyVersion` and `FileVersion` doesn't seem correct when accessed programmatically #81435
  • [API Proposal]: NamedCurves should support Curve25519 and Curve448 #81433
    Future
  • JIT: Don't give up on runtime lookup in inliner too early #81432
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `GlobalizationMode.Invariant` (and potentially others) publicly #81429
    Future
  • GC does not correctly take into account available cache for a VM #81428
    8.0.0
  • Memory Leak in Complex Software with Net 7 #81425
  • Quic listener disposal throws QuicException #81422
    8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add validation code for arm64/neon opcodes #81420
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] do we need VFS #81418
    8.0.0
  • [browser][config] Reading `runArgs` available only on browser #81416
  • NativeAOT Populate source link information in the final PDB #81415
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode(ReadOnlySpan<char> s) #81411
  • [API Proposal]: ECDsa.Create() should be marked as obsoleted #81410
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ClientCertificates_Test ci failures #81405
  • [Wasm][AOT] Using Array.Sort falls back to the interpreter #81403
  • System.Management.dll not working on win-arm64 #81400

Closed

  • It should not be possible to set Activity parent after activity is started #81371
    Future
  • Latest 6.0 SDK/Runtime Docker images segmentation fault on ARM64 #79796
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\Casting\\Functionpointer\\Functionpointer.cmd #81106
    8.0.0
  • The app crashes under .NET7 in Docker with "Fatal error. The RW block to unmap was not found" #80580
  • Optimize arithmetic/bitwise operations of short, ushort, sbyte, and byte. #44849
    Future
  • Rewrite SpanHelpers.IndexOfNullByte/IndexOfNullCharacter to unmanaged pointers #81332
    8.0.0
  • Redundant write-barrier around frozen objects due to CSE #81427
    8.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress-random assert failed (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == nullptr) || (igInLoop->igLoopBackEdge == igLoopHeader) #79986
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix calling JS functions from workers #81268
    8.0.0
  • ValueTaskSource.OnCompleted race condition dispatch cascade #77896
  • ServicePointManager and legacy APIs such as HttpWebRequest #78987
    8.0.0
  • Regression from 5.0: HttpClient does not retry HTTP/1.1 request if TCP connection is closed #60644
    8.0.0
  • Obsolete unused static ServicePointManager members #62770
    8.0.0
  • Improve codegen for Unsafe.AreSame #81386
  • PendingConnectionTimeout logic can be too aggressive in certain scenarios #74581
    8.0.0
  • Package System.Net.Http #77776
    8.0.0
  • Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. (Parameter 'state') #81434
  • Assertion failed 'data->GetRegNum() != REG_WRITE_BARRIER_DST' #77143
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'data->GetRegNum() != REG_ARG_0' #77141
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Add arm64/neon opcode macros to the codegen #80788
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varTypeIsInt(type)' in 'System.Tests.UInt128Tests_GenericMath:TrailingZeroCountTest()' during 'Do value numbering' (IL size 111; hash 0x36fbe8ed; FullOpts) #81366
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/beta2/437017/437017.sh #77960
    8.0.0
  • JIT fullpgo_random_edge crash running System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #77144
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\LoopAlignment\\LoopsToProcess\\LoopsToProcess.cmd #80358
    8.0.0
  • Encoding.UTF8-Api has a low performance? #80067
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988.sh #81326
    8.0.0
  • `System.Collections.Specialized.Tests` crash `remainder by zero` with AOT/chrome #81138
    8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add prerelease version to workload manifest location #79086
    8.0.0
  • Publishing NativeAOT accidently includes any .dll next to .csproj as a FrameworkAssembly #77757
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable packaging of Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks from runtime #81446
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Add CancellationTokenSource.CancelAsync #81444
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Sync ILLink #81441
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger]Adding stack info to the exception details when evaluating expressions #81440
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Update GTF_GLOB_REF after last-use copy omission #81430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pooled async value task for HTTP 1 connection #81426
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Drop `_SampleProject` and `_SampleAssembly` properties #81421
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable jiterpreter traces; fix floating point compares #81417
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update the assert to correctly check if a tree with value has non-zero destination registers #81412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider method accessibility in interface resolution #81409
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make read-only Span-based methods delegate to ReadOnlySpan-based methods #81408
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • Add star into link attributes #81407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable hill climbing by default #81406
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Bump main branding to .NET 8.0 Preview2 #81399
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Branding of .NET 8.0 Preview1 #81398
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Remove manual DLL copy from ILCompiler build task #79783
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disallow setting Parent on the started Activity #81394
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Loop alignment support for xarch #81206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix nullability on `IDesignerSerializationProvider.GetSerializer` #81203
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Rewrite SpanHelpers.IndexOfNullByte/IndexOfNullCharacter to unmanaged pointers #81347
    area-System.Memory
  • Allow overriding WarningsAsErrors policy with an env variable #81402
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser][MT] Calling JS functions from workers + config loading #81273
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • More frozen collection perf, test, and cleanup improvements #81389
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Improve and dedup GetNonZeroBytes #81340
    area-System.Security
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip LSRA inserted nodes in gcIsWriteBarrierCandidate #81423
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] arm64 neon opcodes #81026
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix formatting in list-of-diagnostics.md #81396
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add MCREGs to fix the build for FreeBSD/arm64 #81397
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix import of TrailingZeroCount on ARM64 #81419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • [Android] Fix System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles tests #81368
    area-System.IO, os-android
  • fix the space in build-job.yml #81414
  • [workloads] Calculate PackageVersionNet6 off PackageVersionNet7 #81401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update fgGetTopLevelQmark to handle GT_LCL_FLD #81375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fully resolve WasmNativeWorkload and WasmNativeWorkloadAvailable #81393
    area-Build-mono
  • Narrow PAL tests for _vsnprintf_s #81381
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable producing call stack from crashreport.json #81387
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.15
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address ConfigurationBinder feedback #81384
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2101373 #81359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Improve the codegen of the vector accelerated `System.Numerics.*` types #81335
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.15
  • String.Split() trim last substring if specified #81331
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid xchg for resolution #81216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][ios] Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #81361
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check (#78459) #80636
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Unpin the C# compiler version #81247
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup in HelloiOS app #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81308
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.4
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove types deriving from JsonTypeInfo<T> and mark as sealed. #81306
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • JIT: change profile slop assert to a jitdump note #81377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Count in a few places #81325
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #81238
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • [browser] no posix socks emulation #81182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • WIP: Proof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix the net7.0 build when only net6.0 workloads are installed #81390
    area-Build-mono
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more opcodes #2188
  • NativeAot-LLVM: Merge before putarg type removal PR 68748 #2187

Merged

  • NativeAot-LLVM: Merge to apr 20 #2181

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement cached interface dispatch for WASM #2184

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve error messages reported when a workload is missing #30230

Closed

  • `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Publish.ZipDeploy.targets` fails to create `PubTmp` temporary directory on `dotnet publish` #28830
    7.0.3xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.3xx #30235
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.2xx #30234
  • revert part of #29916 (#29966) #30233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Preview branding #30203
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Prevent editors from auto-trimming trailing whitespaces in test approval files #30044
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 3xx to main #30174
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create the Publish temp folder for Zip deploy if not exist #30201
    Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update README.md #30085
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the non-restored test projects #30190
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Address docs issues in speclets #6934

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AssemblyLoading_DependencyInDifferentDirectory4 fails in Linux CI #66626
  • assemblyloading_assemblylocationnotadded always failed in Linux #66621
  • Expose IAssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsNumericIntPtr #66620
  • microsoft.codeanalysis.buildtasks.unittests.targettests.testimplicitlyskipanalyzers is flaky #66619

Closed

  • "Unnecessary Cast Analyzer" suggests to remove identity conversion on field of struct, which causes a change in behavior #61922
    Backlog
  • AD0001 - Interpolated string with range operator #54364
    Backlog
  • Pattern Matching suggestion moves variable definition into stricter scope #55782
    Backlog
  • Use pattern matching (ID0078) false positive when using .editorconfig #52080
    Backlog
  • IDE0063 removes #pragma statements between using and opening bracket #58861
    Backlog
  • Extract method not offered for expression in 'when' clause of a switch/case pattern match. #24136
    Backlog
  • Switch expression pattern is not using suggestion mode #54977
    17.6
  • IDE0180 false positive (resulting in non-compilable code) #66427
    Backlog
  • VBC.exe doesn't support generated files out #51938
    C# 12.0
  • ConvertNamespaceCodeFixProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #55815
    Backlog
  • Completion suggesting names after typing event name #58162
    Backlog
  • Cannot implement explicit interface member that returns Task<T?> #59765
    Backlog
  • "Implement interface" action can implement the wrong interface #59942
    Backlog
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't implement conversion operators #60212
    17.6 P2
  • `default` constraint of generic type is not generated #66382
    C# 12.0
  • "Implement abstract class" should add "where T : default" when a parameter is covariant in T? #62092
    17.6 P3
  • Removing empty lines in a class can remove all errors from that file #65209
    17.5 P3
  • Suggestion to prefix with "this" doesn't shown when setting delegate prop #64374
    17.5
  • Code Style is not respecting the selection for use of "Prefer framework" for the "Predefined type preferences." #64317
    Backlog
  • IDE1006 should trigger build failed #64464
    Backlog
  • After last update VS stops suggest "Introduce local variable " #66271
    17.5 P3
  • IntelliSense variable name suggestions offered in wrong spot (32601.517.main) #61747
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix "MoveStaticMembers" for VB with invalid member #66629
    Area-IDE
  • Change Signature - Fix 'remove parameter' removing arguments with '@' #66628
    Area-IDE
  • Fix issue where we were errantly offering to make static fields writable #66623
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66617
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Snap 17.6 Preview 1 #66613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • NRTify 'simplify interpolation' #66627
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Keep identity struct casts that may be necessary to preserve semantics #66607
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'features/CollectionLiterals' #66625
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't offer 'use pattern matching' when it would break local scoping #66624
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move compiler from netcoreapp3.1 to net6.0 #66565
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Preserve trivia better when converting to simple using statements #66622
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Increase output in /shared logging #66616
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Allow extract method in when statement #66165
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer suggestion to swap ref-structs/pointers using a tuple #66609
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable GeneratedFilesOut for VB #63759
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Emit `default` constraint on an override when needed. #66603
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Option helpers for VS Mac #66479
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix generating constraints with implement-abstract-class #66615
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update Versions.props and PublishData.json after snap #66614
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66611
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Warn for calls in top-level statements that could be awaited #66571
    Area-Compilers
  • 17.4 Servicing: Fix null ref in change signature #66606
    Area-IDE
  • Remove position argument that is already present in the syntax context #66428
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Update Project.HasSuccessfullyLoadedAsync logic #66569
    Area-IDE
  • Process host outputs by `GeneratorDriver` #66570
    Area-Compilers
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Fix semicolon placement in statement-placement fixer #66610
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Meter/Counters to track hits for each route/endpoint #46361
  • Row expand on rows in Blazor QuickGrid #46356
  • Blazor initializer scripts are cached when they clearly have been changed- #46355
  • Render a webassembly component into the page #46354
    8.0-preview2
  • Render a server component into the page #46353
    8.0-preview2
  • We can render updates while we SSR an app #46352
    8.0-preview2
  • We can perform basic CRUD operations on a completely SSR Razor Components app #46351
    8.0-preview2
  • We can render a page statically SSR using Razor components. #46350
    8.0-preview2
  • Support generating parameter validations via source generation #46349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • route with product/detail/{id?}-{persionKey?}-{sex?}-{price?} not work #46359
  • ConfigurationBuilder not support record type #46345
  • Is there a way I can compile small piece of C# code to wasm #46344
    Discussions
  • Share route pattern parsing logic between analyzers and generators #46342
    .NET 8 Planning
  • DeveloperExceptionMiddleware shouldn't have dependencies to `ProblemDetails` #46339

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 5, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107944-.NET5 #36357
  • 'The process cannot access the file' during CI build sometimes #32219
  • Simplify single file directories in shared sources #19080
    Backlog
  • Reduce PR / official build differences #32910
  • [Blazor] InputText component renders invalid html #46183
    8.0-preview2
  • Using angular template project. Running "ng serve" independently fails when trying to proxy request to dotnet. #45364
    8.0-preview1
  • Update template metadata for net8 #45077
    8.0-preview1
  • Unobserved task exception in SignalR C# client when streaming #46169
    8.0-preview2

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Newtonsoft.Json deserialization fails in Release build, works fine in Debug build #13033
  • CarouselView crashes on iOS when outer view IsVisible is set to false #13031
  • This issue still persists with the latest release version #13029
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView does not reorder when grouped #13027
  • ObservableCollection is not returning values for ContentPage (IOS) Bindable Context #13026
  • Provide a cross platform API for customizing the TitleBar of desktop apps #13023
    Backlog
  • Consider enabling the interpreter by default for release builds #13019
  • Maui Blazor App :in (release process: "ipa" file ) project crashes on showing a nuget control #13016
  • Label fails to display html text when populated via binding #13015
  • .net MAUI Picker SelectedIndex does not cause item to display #13013
  • [Mac]Fail to install 7.0 MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.sdk.ios version 16.2.36... is not found in NuGet feeds" #13012
  • Border StrokeThickness decreases Height on Android #13011
    Backlog

Closed

  • Maui MacCatalyst app can't be successfully submitted to Apple macOS store #12311
  • net7 maui.android project cant debug #12983
  • RadioButton ControlTemplate not indicating selected button #9370
  • Android Radio Button Issue (Cant select radio button with Image) #8325
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • `main` into `net8.0` #13035
  • Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
  • Windows apps do not need GUIDs (drop GUIDs) #13032
  • [Windows] Fix issue with caching the page that holds unfocused control #13028
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
  • [iOS] Fix issue rendering Button Background gradient with shadow #13022
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [housekeeping] Merge main to .net8 branch #13021
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix dotnet format workflows #13018
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 #13017
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Merge a few net8.0 changes into main to make conflicts happen less #13024
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [mega-pipeline] Update folder nuget source when installing .net #13003
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • fix: Fixed nullable annotations for WeakEventManager. #12950
    community ✨
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12971
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12934
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Build] Mega pipeline net8 #12966
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599
    community ✨
